text: <@U01DG96K18T> Awesome, thanks!

Hi All! Is there a way to trigger an event if a HubSpot Product object is created/updated? I am trying to create a web hook to 'listen' for any changes in the Products object. Can't seem to find the right trigger. I'm thinking to use workflows, but there's no Product-based workflow trigger. Any idea is greatly appreciated :relaxed:
Hey Folks, has anyone bulk created properties via the API before? Looking to create a spreadsheet with listed custom properties for contacts/deals, then just pump it in.
Should save manually creating 500+ properties manually!
I've done this before using IPaaS tools like <https://pipedream.com/|pipedream> or <http://integromat.com/|Integromat>. You should try it out :slightly_smiling_face:
hi there I wonder whether there is a separate company List Endpoint where I can retrieve Companies in a List rather than contact. Thx for your help

Hi everybody. I’m not very experienced with API dev in general and want to get a start into it. I read something about Postman and want to play around a bit. Do you have a good source for a general overview? Best, Sebastian
Hey everyone, new to HubSpot. I'm trying to prove out the capabilities of Drupal integration with HubSpot API. Has anyone worked on that specifically?
posting again: I am tryin to have deep link to directly open a deal or contact. the url format will require portal id. How do i obtain that?
Is it possible to create custom objects in an app?

I asked the same and got this answer:
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1613424141232500>
<@UFBNA9K9A> Did this get fixed?
negative
assuming you are wanting to define it rather than create a record

postmam is :thumbsup: .  I use it daily.
Are you looking for an overview of APIs or of postman?

Hey y'all, is there any way to debug why my CRM card failed? I've formatted my response to adhere to the documentation, but it's still not parsing it correctly. The monitoring tab is showing a 200 response, but does not give any more details.

Getting feedback from HubSpot somehow on these failures would be very nice. For me, it was just going over my response very carefully against the docs. Especially when using any of the field types that require a more complex response data structure, e.g. links or status or whatnot.
I’d love to see “recent errors” or something in the App dashboard for the CRM card.

Is there any discussion of the Workflow Log Events API getting *un*-deprecated? With the new custom workflow actions, it might have more viable use cases now. (For example, enabling a custom workflow step for enrolling a contact in another workflow that blocks until that other workflow is complete)
I suppose the other workflow could have its own custom step at the end to signify completion
Anyhow, still seems like it could be a useful thing to keep around, even if my initial example has an acceptable workaround
Agreed. I managed to figure it out by stripping everything out of my object and sent a single "title" field lol!
Do you know if your idea of more logging has been posted to the forums just yet?
I do not know. I haven’t taken any action besides grumbling in my coffee.

i havent seen it posted to the community, but you should add an <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/custom/page/page-id/ideaslandingpage|idea>.  feel free to grumble at both your coffee and there :wink:
(i particularly enjoyed the coffee grumbling comment as i have been there many times)
Ideally both :slightly_smiling_face:
